titleStmt.title: Mendacimastix or, A whip for the colosan [sic] lyer, being a brief answer, to the relation of two invisible old men, reported to be seen in Tholouze in France: in a letter sent from a friend in London, to the French pseudographir [sic].

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; publisher and date from colophon.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
